Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities debt
proceeds from sale of u s treasury bills and available for sale securities debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from collection of loans receivable
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities debt
payments to acquire equity securities fv ni
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from redemptions and maturities of marketable securities fixed maturities
proceeds from sale of equity securities fv ni
proceeds from sale of marketable securities fixed maturities
proceeds from sales and redemptions of equity securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in deferred charges reinsurance assumed
increase decrease in deferred charges retroactive reinsurance
increase decrease in derivative contract assets and liabilities
increase decrease in liability for claims and claims adjustment expense reserve
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in other operating liabilities
Depreciation and Amortization: accretion amortization of discounts and premiums investments
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities

__unmapped__: payments to acquire noncontrolling interest and repurchase common stock
payments to acquire preferred stock common stock and other investments
payments to acquire u s treasury bills and available for sale securities debt
payments to minority shareholders and proceeds from payments for other financing activities
proceeds from redemptions and maturities of u s treasury bills and available for sale securities debt
